overview:
Anthony Ginn has built and lead a number of marketing organizations in Fortune 500 to start-up companies with 15 years of experience as an innovative executive leader in marketing and business management. He currently serves as VP of Marketing at SteelHouse, a digital display advertising platform for eCommerce marketers.

Anthony began his career in direct to consumer financial services at Northwestern Mutual, TransAmerica and E*TRADE Financial where he lead asset management marketing and introduced a number of innovative mutual fund and ETF products. He then served as VP of Marketing at Nationpoint and H&R Blockâ€™s Consumer Financial Services Group before taking on a position as Head of Customer & Lifecycle Marketing at eHarmony, alongside SteelHouse President & CEO Mark Douglas. Immediately before joining SteelHouse, Anthony served as VP Marketing, Sales & Support at VerticalResponse and currently serves in an advisory capacity at SpeedDate.com.
